title: Comedies. 1st 20 years. Part 2: 1904-1907
brief_description:
Compilation of silent comedy motion pictures restored from the Library of Congress paper prints.
Contents: The Suburbanite (1904)—Tom, Tom, the piper’s son (1905)—An Acadian elopement
